long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto Web Checker is an add-on that allows you to check if the site you're browsing on is a scam or not. The add-on will use it's database of trustworthy sites and show you a green light if it is safe. This add-on can be used while surfing any site and keep visitors informed.
